name: WHERE HAS THE BROCCOLI GONE
description:
WebGL version had borked textures, built out the executables for Windows and MacOS.

Solo Project.

Game Controls:

A-D -> Move

Spacebar -> Charge Jump

Esc -> Bring up Leave Room Button

Hold R -> Restart Level

Platformer with a high level of difficulty in the vein of Jump King. Dying leaves behind your previous body which can be used in various platforming challenges.

Has a singleplayer portion that should be played first, and a Cooperative portion that requires another player. HIGHLY RECOMMEND GRABBING A FRIEND ON DISCORD TO PLAY THRU THE COOP PORTION! Can also be played with yourself thru 2 instances of the executable.

All game assets were made by myself, using Blender, Audacity and Unity3D.
